title: Family Dynamics, Lessons Learned, Emails Answered
description:
Jillian takes a deep dive into managing difficult family dynamics - especially during the holidays.  Plus, the latest on her “feud” with Teddi Mellencamp, and listener emails on everything from maintenance mode to hormone balancing. 


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy
